properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key used for JWT token generation and validation.

properties.name: jwt.expiration
properties.description: JWT token expiration time in seconds.

properties.name: ollama.base-url
properties.description: Base URL for Ollama API server.

properties.name: ollama.api-key
properties.description: API key for Ollama Cloud authentication.

properties.name: ollama.model
properties.description: Ollama model name to use for AI chat.
